articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Reprocessing of Spent Fuel Rods
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Reprocessing of Spent Fuel Rods
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Saturday as regards the issue of the reprocessing of spent fuel rods of a pilot atomic power plant.
					 The reprocessing of spent fuel rods from the pilot atomic power plant began as declared in the Foreign Ministry statement dated April 14.
					
					 This will contribute to bolstering the nuclear deterrence for self-defence in every way to cope with the increasing military threats from the hostile forces.

articles.title: Greetings to Tanzanian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Tanzanian President
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Jakaya Mrisho Kikwete, Tanzanian president, on the occasion of the 45th founding anniversary of the United Republic of Tanzania.
					 Kim in his message said that the government and people of Tanzania have made great successes in their efforts to achieve the national unity and economic development for the last 45 years since the foundation of the country. 
					
					 The message wished the president success in his work for the prosperity of the country and expressed belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Tanzania would grow stronger in the mutual interests.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the mayor of a city of the Region of Moscow in Russia, on the occasion of the 77th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 The gift was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Russia by the mayor on April 21.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 77th birthday of the KPA. 
					 Servicepersons of the KPA, people from all walks of life and school youth and children in Pyongyang and overseas compatriots visited the statue of the President on Mansu Hill.
					
					 Seen standing before the statue was a floral basket sent by        Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA. 
					
					 Laid before the statue were floral baskets in the name of the Party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA, institutions in the fields of science, education, culture and art, public health and media, factories and enterprises and schools and flowers. 
					
					 Written on the ribbons of the floral baskets were words "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will live forever," "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us," "The great revolutionary exploits of the respected leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung are immortal!" and others. 
					
					 The masses paid homage to the President in humble reverence. 
					
					 Floral baskets were placed before his statues in different parts of Pyongyang. 
					
					 The KPA servicepersons, people and school youth and children in different parts of the country visited the statues of the President in their residential areas to place floral baskets and flowers and pay the noblest respects to the President.

articles.title: Wreaths and Floral Baskets Laid
articles.content:
Wreaths and Floral Baskets Laid
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and floral baskets before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Saturday on the occasion of the 77th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Seen at the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA. 
					
					 Present at wreath-floral basket laying ceremonies were senior officials of the party, army and state, a chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK were laid on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries. And a floral basket in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee and the WPK Central Military Commission was laid before the main theme sculpture "Victory" of the victorious war memorial tower. 
					
					 Wreaths and floral baskets in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units, scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and press organs, and party and power bodies, factories and farms in Pyongyang were also placed.
					
					 Written on the ribbons of wreaths and floral baskets were letters reading "Glory to Revolutionary Martyrs!", "Glory to Patriotic Martyrs!" and "Victory and Glory to Servicepersons of the Heroic Korean People's Army!"
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the memory of martyrs and paid respects to the servicepersons of the KPA.
					
					 The military attaches corps here laid a wreath before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and a floral basket before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Saturday.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and observed a moment's silence to the memory of her.
					
					 Wreaths were laid before the statues of martyrs, monuments to fallen fighters of the KPA and graves of martyrs in different parts of the country on the same day.

articles.title: Performances Given to Celebrate KPA Anniversary
articles.content:
Performances Given to Celebrate KPA Anniversary
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Performances were given at theatres in Pyongyang and local areas on Saturday to celebrate the 77th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The revolutionary drama "Woman Comrade of Mt. Paektu" was given by the artistes of the State Theatrical Troupe at the State Theatre in Pyongyang. 
					
					 The artistes of the State Folk Art Troupe gave a music and dance performance at the Central Youth Hall while those of the orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute a concert at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall.
					
					 Put on the stages were such colorful pieces as female solo and chorus "We Are Grateful to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung," song and dance "Mangyongdae, the Cradle of Revolution," female solo "Red Chol Pass" and orchestra "149 Turns towards Forefront." 
					
					 The performers made artistic expression of their gratefulness and reverence for Kim Il Sung, the invincible and iron-willed commander, who performed undying exploits in the building of Juche-oriented army and the history of the revolutionary wars and enthusiastically sang of the undying exploits of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il who is glorifying the dignity of socialist Korea.
					
					 Circus shows were given by the Pyongyang Circus and the Pyongyang Moranbong Circus. 
					
					 Similar celebration performances were given at art theatres and cultural houses in different provinces including Ryanggang, North Hwanghae and North Hamgyong Provinces on the same day.

articles.title: People's Delegations Visit KPA Units and Security Forces
articles.content:
People's Delegations Visit KPA Units and Security Forces
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- People's delegations visited units of the Korean People's Army and the People's Security Forces on the occasion of the 77th birthday of the KPA. 
					 Meetings of conveying gifts sent by Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA, took place at units of the KPA and the Korean People's Security Forces.
					
					 Members of the delegations looked round the rooms devoted to the units' history showing victories and feats performed by them under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They told servicepersons about the rear and handed aid materials prepared by the people with sincerity, congratulating the servicepersons on the army day. 
					
					 The members of the delegations played colorful sports games and had recreation parties with servicepersons.
					
					 Members of the delegations looked round barracks, mess halls, non-staple food stores, soldiers' halls and others and appreciated the art performances given by servicepersons.

articles.title: Revolutionary Armed Forces of DPRK 77 Years Old
articles.content:
Revolutionary Armed Forces of DPRK 77 Years Old
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army (KPA) is greeting its 77th birthday.
					 People's delegations which consist of persons of all strata visit KPA units to congratulate soldiers on their red-letter day.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of Korea which were founded on April 25, Juche 21 (1932) by President Kim Il Sung with just more than 100 guerrillas fought two revolutionary wars to win back the country from the Japanese imperialists and beat back the U.S. imperialists' armed invasion against the young DPRK in the 20th century.
					
					 According to the existing common sense and conception, the above-said revolutionary armed forces were incomparable with their enemies numerically and technically. 
					
					 The young Korean People's Revolutionary Army had to fight against the one million strong-Kwantung Army equipped with artillery pieces, tanks and warplanes.
					
					 The anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters waged a bloody guerrilla warfare, securing food, military uniforms and weapons by themselves without any logistic base in the rear. But they crushed the Japanese imperialists, which styled themselves "leader" of Asia, and liberated the country at last.
					
					 The KPA, which developed into a regular army three years after the liberation of the country, had to fight in the 1950s against the U.S. imperialists who had boasted of "their victories" in more than a hundred aggressive and predatory wars.
					
					 When starting the Korean war, The U.S. imperialists calculated that they would win the war with ease, even fixing the date of their "victory." However, the KPA wiped out the over two million strong-enemy troops in the war as the Korean proverb says that a wolf should be punished with a stick.
					
					During the war the KPA soldiers killed, injured or captured 1,567,128 enemy personnel, downed, damaged or captured 12,224 warplanes, destroyed or captured 3,255 tanks and armored vehicles, sank or damaged 564 warships and vessels and destroyed or captured 7,695 artillery pieces of various types.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of Korea could win those victories in the wars against the aggressor forces of two imperialisms entirely because they were under the supreme commandership of President Kim Il Sung. Today the Korean People's Army having Kim Jong Il as its Supreme Commander is capable of crushing any formidable imperialist armed forces at a stroke.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves
  Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation headed by Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun left here by air today to participate in the ministerial meeting of the Coordinating Committee of Non-aligned Movement to be held in Cuba. 
					 The delegation will visit Cuba and other Latin American countries as the government delegation of the DPRK.

articles.title: 77th KPA Anniversary Hailed by Media
articles.content:
77th KPA Anniversary Hailed
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Saturday dedicate editorials to the 77th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Rodong Sinmun in its editorial says that President Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on April 25, Juche 21 (1932), an epoch-making event of fundamental significance in building the Korean revolutionary armed forces and carving out the destiny of the nation. 
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 Since he embarked on the road of the revolution the President always gave priority to the armed forces and opened up the way for victory depending on the might of the army.
					
					 True to the President's Songun idea, our army has, since its birth, displayed matchless heroism in the grave class struggle and anti-imperialist revolutionary wars and creditably carried out its mission as core ranks and driving force of the revolution in every period and at every stage of developing revolution.
					
					The KPA, which recorded the ever-victorious history under the Songun leadership of the President, is playing the vanguard role in the struggle to carry forward the Juche cause upholding the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Our army has advanced along the militant course of victory and glory for nearly 80 years since it made the first gun report in the forest of Mt. Paektu under the great banner of Songun. This was possible because the army fully inherited the idea, will, spirit and disposition of Kim Il Sung, brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, and Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA, and has worked as a vanguard detachment of the commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 No matter how much water may flow under the bridge and how many generations are altered, the revolutionary character of the KPA as the army of the leader and the supreme commander will remain unchanged. 
					
					 The KPA fully equipped with the idea of Kim Jong Il, illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu, is displaying the might of the strongest and elite army, winning victories encouraged by his pluck and spirit and pushing forward the revolution and construction the way he does. 
					
					 The KPA will as ever successfully fulfill the honorable mission and duty as the core of the Korean revolutionary ranks and militant lifeguards in accomplishing the noble cause for opening up the rosy future of the Songun revolution true to the intention and will of the commanders of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Minju Joson in its editorial stresses that the Songun revolutionary cause of the Workers' Party of Korea is invincible as the KPA, which has grown into the strong and matchless revolutionary army in the course of 70 odd years of protracted struggle under the legendary great persons of Mt. Paektu, is standing in the van of the revolution.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Cooperation with Outsiders Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Cooperation with Outsiders Assailed
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak, addressing a meeting for the founding of the puppet marine corps, asserted that he would settle the "north's missile and nuclear issues" by pooling "efforts with the international community." Meanwhile the minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade" when meeting with the foreign minister of Japan let loose a string of reckless remarks that he would closely cooperate with Japan to solve the north's nuclear issue. 
					 Their rash actions are nothing but a foolish behavior of those traitors who think that cooperation with outsiders will solve everything, bereft of even an iota of national consciousness and independence, Rodong Sinmun observes this in a signed commentary today.
					
					 It brands the "policy toward the north" pursued by the Lee Myung Bak regime as a sycophantic and traitorous one inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen and running diametrically counter to "By our nation itself," the basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that the Lee group put forward "strengthened alliance" with its American and Japanese masters as the most important task since it came to power, in disregard of fellow countrymen, guided by the traitorous theory of depending on outsiders and has worked with bloodshot eyes to do harm to the DPRK based on it and such moves have reached a height now. 
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 Dependence on outsiders can never help solve problems.
					
					 The DPRK is never browbeaten by the unreasonable pressure racket kicked up by the traitors with the backing of outsiders as it regards independence as its supreme dignity and life and soul.
					
					 The racket only brought into bolder relief the traitorous colors of the Lee group hell bent on flunkeyism and dependence on outsiders and will compel the people of the DPRK to harden their will to settle accounts with the group of traitors who turned their backs on the nation.
					
					 The above-said group should come to itself, though belatedly, bearing in mind that the sycophantic and treacherous actions of cooperating with foreign forces, while rejecting national cooperation will only invite destruction and shame and an irreversible catastrophe in the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 The DPRK will thoroughly calculate the crimes committed by the Lee group doing harm to fellow countrymen in league with outsiders while swimming against the trend of the times toward national independence and certainly force them to pay for the treacherous crimes committed by them.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Unreasonable Judgment Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Unreasonable Judgment Flailed
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea issued a statement on April 21 denouncing the puppet authorities for their unreasonable judgment.
					 The statement condemned the Seoul Central District Court for holding a trial that day where it labeled the solidarity as an "enemy-benefiting organization" and sentenced to penal servitude the hardcore members of the solidarity.
					
					 It said that the case of the solidarity was faked up by the security authorities pursuant to the Lee Myung Bak regime's policy for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Noting that the solidarity has conducted positive activities to implement the June 15 joint declaration since its formation, the statement condemned the present regime for suppressing the solidarity, the organization for the reunification movement, after branding it as an "illegal organization" overnight.
					
					 It urged the judicial authorities to cancel the unreasonable judgment upon the solidarity and set free its hardcore members at once.
					
					 It noted that the solidarity would wage a more dynamic struggle to have the "Security Law" abolished and defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration despite the brutal suppression by the authorities.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Urged to Step Down in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Urged to Step Down in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea made public a statement on April 21 to denounce the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its frantic anti-DPRK confrontational moves.
					 The statement accused the Lee "government" of getting hell-bent on confrontational racket, while talking about its full participation in the PSI under the pretext of the north's satellite launch.
					
					 The authorities' moves to contain the north militarily under the signboard of the PSI are no more than a rash act of fully exposing themselves before the nation as wicked traitorous forces keen on inciting confrontation and a war regime, it said, adding:
					
					 Lee Myung Bak claims that south Korea's full participation in the PSI has nothing to do with the north's launch of satellite, but this is only a deception. The present "government" is bound to go to ruin as it is keen on confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The statement urged Lee Myung Bak to immediately halt the moves for full participation in the PSI as it would further strain the military tension on the Korean Peninsula and step down, holding all the responsibility for the deteriorated inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Japanese Government's Hostile Moves against DPRK Lambasted
articles.content:
Japanese Government's Hostile Moves against DPRK Lambasted
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries' frantic moves against the DPRK as evidenced by their misrepresentation of its launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 as a "missile launch" is sparking off strong accusation and denunciation from various circles of Japan.
					 Shigeru Koga, candidate for Amagasaki City Dietman of Hyogo Prefecture, said that the DPRK's satellite launch is not problematic in view of the outer space treaty as it informed relevant international organizations of its satellite launch beforehand. Only Japan is hysterically kicking up a big racket, labeling the satellite as a "missile," he noted.
					
					 Masaaki Arimoto, co-representative of the "Osaka Citizens Solidarity for Early Normalization of Japan-DPRK Relations," said that the Japanese government and media are making a fuss, creating the feelings of a crisis over the DPRK's launch of the satellite for peaceful purposes. The DPRK's satellite launch is an admirable event as it greatly contributed to the development of science and technology and the promotion of prosperity in the DPRK, he added.
					
					 Honorary Professor of Saitama University Takao Kamakura, who is former rector of Higashinihon International University, said that it is entirely unreasonable for the Japanese government to insist on applying new sanctions against the DPRK on charges of violation of a UNSC "resolution."
					
					 Honorary Professor of the University of Tokyo Haruki Wata noted that it is wrong for the government to create extreme phobia among people and take tough steps while misrepresenting the said launch as a "missile launch." It cannot be interpreted otherwise than a revelation of its intention to restore popularity under the unstable political circumstances, he added. 
					
					 Hirogazu Kitagawa, deputy general secretary of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, stressed that the Japanese government should lift the sanctions against the DPRK and opt for dialogue according to the Japan-DPRK Pyongyang Declaration.

articles.title: UNSC's "Presidential Statement" Flayed
articles.content:
UNSC's "Presidential Statement" Flayed
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Organizations in different countries released a joint statement and statements on April 14 and 15 condemning the UNSC's "presidential statement."
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in the joint statement accused the UNSC of taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and branded the action as interference in the internal affairs of the DPRK and a wanton violation of international law.
					
					 The statement stated that the "presidential statement," a product of plot bred by the U.S. imperialists, the south Korean puppet clique and the Japanese reactionary forces, evidently showed that the UNSC is no more than a tool serving the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee in a statement referred to the fact that throughout history the UNSC has never called satellite launches into question and no country had been condemned for launching them, extending support to the principled stand of the DPRK.
					
					 The Syrian Trade Unions Federation in a statement said that the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes is the legitimate right pertaining to the sovereignty of the DPRK, asserting that this is neither infringement upon the rights of other countries nor challenge and violation of UN resolutions and the international community.
					
					 Meanwhile, Thomas Losh, chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, issued a statement on April 15 rejecting the UNSC's "presidential statement."

articles.title: Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies Formed
articles.content:
Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies Formed
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies was formed on April 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					   The chairman of the group was elected at the inaugural ceremony.
					
					M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, in his speech at the inaugural ceremony said that the group would conduct brisk activities for studying and disseminating the greatness of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the Juche idea, Songun idea and make positive efforts to embody the principle of self-reliance in the reality of Nigeria.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Pakistan
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Pakistan
Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings and film shows took place in Lahore and Karachi of Pakistan on April 9 and 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display in the venues of the events were works of the peerlessly great persons and photos showing their undying feats and introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 The secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association highly praised the undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung before the country and the people.
					
					The secretary general stressed that General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is successfully carrying forward Kim Il Sung's idea and cause has consolidated the socialist system and turned the DPRK into an invincible fortress to honorably defend the country from the imperialists' aggression by pursing the Songun politics.
					
					 The general secretary of the Pakistan Organization for Afro-Asian People's Solidarity praised Kim Il Sung as great father who devoted his all to the happiness of the people and prosperity of the country and put forward the Korean people as the most dignified people in the world, hailing the popular policies enforced in the DPRK.
					
					 The secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association said that Kim Il Sung is the great sun as he founded the immortal Juche idea and indicated the way ahead of the Korean people and the progressive humankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies spoke with high appreciation that Kim Il Sung is the savior and great father of the Korean nation who defeated the two imperialist formidable enemies in one generation and the outstanding pioneer of the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle.
					
					 Letters to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let the Entire Nation Unite and Hasten the Reunification of the Country" was brought out in booklet by the Victorial Publishing House of Pakistan.
					 The work, published on August 18, Juche 79 (1990), clarifies the idea that the pan-national rally is a historical one to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean people's struggle and indicates the tasks and ways for achieving national reunification.
					
					 A ceremony for releasing the work was held on April 16.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il se reune con contribuidores a satelite artificial
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il se reune con contribuidores a satelite artificial
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se fotografio con los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios quienes contribuyeron al lanzamiento exitoso del satelite artificial de la tierra "Kwangmyongsong No. 2".
					El Dirigente respondio a las efusivas aclamaciones de los participantes y les dio cordial saludo.
					
					  El felicito calurosamente a los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios quienes con ardiente patriotismo dedicaron toda su inteligencia y pasion al lanzamiento de dicho satelite artificial y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					  Senalo que el lanzamiento exitoso del satelite artificial que es conjunto de ciencias y tecnologias es el jubilo nacional que demostro con vigor a todo el mundo la dignidad y el invencible poderio de Corea del Songun y la ilimitada potencia espiritual del pueblo coreano y es un acontecimiento historico que dio la primera detonacion de canon de la victoria en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Expreso la conviccion de que los cientificos y los tecnicos, bien conscientes de la responsabilidad de mision de la epoca de ser vanguardistas que abren las puertas a la gran potencia prospera, responderan con grandes logros cientifico-tecnicos a la confianza y la esperanza del partido al investigar e introducir valiosas ciencias y tecnicas capaces de contribuir a la construccion de la potencia economica.
					
					  Le acompanaron el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares Kim Yong Chun, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC Ri Yong Ho, los miembros del CDN de la RPDC: el secretario del CC del PTC Jon Pyong Ho, el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC Kim Jong Gak y el primer viceministro de las FAP Kim Il Chol.

articles.title: MINREX se refiere al reprocesamiento de barras usadas
articles.content:
MINREX se refiere al reprocesamiento de barras usadas
  Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ATCC) -- Consultado por la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea en relacion con el problema de retratamiento de las barras usadas de la planta nuclear piloto, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio este sabado la siguiente respuesta:
					 Como hemos anunciado a traves de la declaracion fechada 14 de abril del MINREX, comenzo el reprocesamiento de las barras usadas en la planta nuclear piloto de nuestro pais.
					
					 Esta actividad contribuira a fortalecer por todos los medios el disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa frente a la creciente amenaza militar de las fuerzas hostiles.

articles.title: Periodicos conmemoran el 77o aniversario de fundacion del EPC
articles.content:
Periodicos conmemoran el 77o aniversario de fundacion del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ATCC) -- Los periodicos centrales publicaron este sabado sendos editoriales dedicados al 77o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					   El Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo el 25 de abril del 21 (1932) de la Era Juche el Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea, recuerda el diario Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					  Ese evento trascendental tiene mucha importancia en la construccion de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y en la forja del destino de la nacion coreana.
					
					Desde el principio de sus actividades revolucionarias, el Presidente vino alcanzando las victorias anteponiendo a las fuerzas armadas y apoyandose en el poderio de ellas.
					
					En pleno acato a la idea del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Presidente, desde el primer dia de su fundacion, el Ejercito Popular de Corea manifesto su incomparable heroismo en la severa lucha clasista y la guerra revolucionaria antiimperialista y cumplio excelentemente su mision de unidad medular y grueso de la revolucion en cada periodo y cada etapa del desarrollo de la revolucion.
					
					El EPC, que escribio la historia de triunfos bajo la direccion del Songun del Presidente, cumple el papel de vanguardia tambien en la lucha por llevar a feliz termino la causa del Juche acatando la politica de Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Durante cerca de 80 anos desde que abrio el primer fuego en la selva del monte Paektu bajo la gran bandera del Songun, el EPC recorrio su trayectoria combativa coronada unicamente de triunfos y glorias porque lucho como vanguardia de los generales del monte Paektu heredando la idea, la voluntad, el espiritu y el temperamento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, genial comandante del Paektu, y del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Aunque se sucedan los siglos y las generaciones, no se cambiara jamas el caracter revolucionario del EPC como las fuerzas armadas del lider y del Comandante Supremo.
					
					  Hoy dia, el EPC manifiesta su gallardo aspecto de poderoso ejercito de flor y nata que comparte la idea del Dirigente, general insigne del monte Paektu, triunfa con su audacia e impetu e impulsa a la manera de el la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					  Al igual que en el pasado, el EPC seguira cumpliendo con exito su honrosa mision y deber como fuerza medular y vanguardia combativa de las filas revolucionarias de Corea en el cumplimiento de la sagrada causa para forjar el futuro radiante de la revolucion del Songun acatando el proposito y la voluntad de los generales del monte Paektu.
					
					A su vez, el periodico Minju Joson enfatiza que se cumplira con la victoria la causa revolucionaria del Songun del Partido del Trabajo de Corea porque tiene al frente al Ejercito Popular de Corea que ha crecido bajo la direccion de los grandes hombres legendarios del Paektu como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias en el fragor de la larga lucha de mas de 70 anos.

articles.title: Funciones artisticas dedicadas al 77o aniversario del EPC
articles.content:
Funciones artisticas dedicadas al 77o aniversario del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 25 en los teatros centrales y locales las funciones artisticas por el 77o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					  En el Teatro Nacional de Drama en esta capital se ofrecio la funcion del drama revolucionario "La camarada del monte Paektu" interpretado por los artistas del Conjunto Dramatico Nacional.
					
					  El Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional realizo la funcion de cantos y bailes en la Casa Central de la Juventud mientras la Orquesta del Instituto de Musica Yun I Sang ofrecio un concierto en la Casa de Musica homonima.
					
					  En las escenas se presentaron el solo femenino y coro "Gracias, Generalisimo Kim Il Sung", el canto y baile "Mangyongdae, cuna de la revolucion", el solo femenino "Rojo pico Chol", la musica orquestal "149 curvas en el camino al frente avanzado", etc.
					
					  Los ejecutantes expresaron el agradecimiento y la veneracion al Presidente Kim Il Sung, genial comandante de acero, quien realizo inmortales hazanas en la historia de la construccion del ejercito Juche y la de guerras revolucionarias, y cantaron con emocion las inmortales proezas del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il quien exalta la dignidad de la Corea socialista.
					
					  Tambien, se realizaron las funciones del Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang y el Conjunto Circense Morambong de Pyongyang.
					
					  El mismo dia, tuvieron lugar las funciones festivas en los teatros y las casas culturales provinciales incluyendo de las provincias de Ryanggang, de Hwanghae del Norte y de Hamgyong del Norte.
